name: Lindsay P. SHULER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, et al. & its Staff, et al. Appellees
name_abbreviation: Shuler v. Pennsylvania Bureau of Community Corrections

parties: Lindsay P. SHULER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, et al. & its Staff, et al. Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of June, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
46 A.3d 1285
Lindsay P. SHULER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BUREAU OF COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, et al. & its Staff, et al. Appellees.
